rows.title: How to get all possible combinations of a listâ€™s elements?

523:
<p>This is an approach that can be easily transfered to all programming languages supporting recursion <strong>(no itertools, no yield, no list comprehension)</strong>:</p>

<pre class="lang-py s-code-block"><code class="hljs language-python"><span class="hljs-keyword">def</span> <span class="hljs-title function_">combs</span>(<span class="hljs-params">a</span>):
    <span class="hljs-keyword">if</span> <span class="hljs-built_in">len</span>(a) == <span class="hljs-number">0</span>:
        <span class="hljs-keyword">return</span> [[]]
    cs = []
    <span class="hljs-keyword">for</span> c <span class="hljs-keyword">in</span> combs(a[<span class="hljs-number">1</span>:]):
        cs += [c, c+[a[<span class="hljs-number">0</span>]]]
    <span class="hljs-keyword">return</span> cs

<span class="hljs-meta">&gt;&gt;&gt; </span>combs([<span class="hljs-number">1</span>,<span class="hljs-number">2</span>,<span class="hljs-number">3</span>,<span class="hljs-number">4</span>,<span class="hljs-number">5</span>])
[[], [<span class="hljs-number">1</span>], [<span class="hljs-number">2</span>], [<span class="hljs-number">2</span>, <span class="hljs-number">1</span>], [<span class="hljs-number">3</span>], [<span class="hljs-number">3</span>, <span class="hljs-number">1</span>], [<span class="hljs-number">3</span>, <span class="hljs-number">2</span>], ..., [<span class="hljs-number">5</span>, <span class="hljs-number">4</span>, <span class="hljs-number">3</span>, <span class="hljs-number">2</span>, <span class="hljs-number">1</span>]]
</code></pre>

<p>Here is one using recursion:</p>

<pre class="lang-py s-code-block"><code class="hljs language-python"><span class="hljs-meta">&gt;&gt;&gt; </span><span class="hljs-keyword">import</span> copy
<span class="hljs-meta">&gt;&gt;&gt; </span><span class="hljs-keyword">def</span> <span class="hljs-title function_">combinations</span>(<span class="hljs-params">target,data</span>):
<span class="hljs-meta">... </span>    <span class="hljs-keyword">for</span> i <span class="hljs-keyword">in</span> <span class="hljs-built_in">range</span>(<span class="hljs-built_in">len</span>(data)):
<span class="hljs-meta">... </span>        new_target = copy.copy(target)
<span class="hljs-meta">... </span>        new_data = copy.copy(data)
<span class="hljs-meta">... </span>        new_target.append(data[i])
<span class="hljs-meta">... </span>        new_data = data[i+<span class="hljs-number">1</span>:]
<span class="hljs-meta">... </span>        <span class="hljs-built_in">print</span> new_target
<span class="hljs-meta">... </span>        combinations(new_target,
<span class="hljs-meta">... </span>                     new_data)
<span class="hljs-meta">... </span>                     
<span class="hljs-meta">... </span>
<span class="hljs-meta">&gt;&gt;&gt; </span>target = []
<span class="hljs-meta">&gt;&gt;&gt; </span>data = [<span class="hljs-string">'a'</span>,<span class="hljs-string">'b'</span>,<span class="hljs-string">'c'</span>,<span class="hljs-string">'d'</span>]
<span class="hljs-meta">&gt;&gt;&gt; </span>
<span class="hljs-meta">&gt;&gt;&gt; </span>combinations(target,data)
[<span class="hljs-string">'a'</span>]
[<span class="hljs-string">'a'</span>, <span class="hljs-string">'b'</span>]
[<span class="hljs-string">'a'</span>, <span class="hljs-string">'b'</span>, <span class="hljs-string">'c'</span>]
[<span class="hljs-string">'a'</span>, <span class="hljs-string">'b'</span>, <span class="hljs-string">'c'</span>, <span class="hljs-string">'d'</span>]
[<span class="hljs-string">'a'</span>, <span class="hljs-string">'b'</span>, <span class="hljs-string">'d'</span>]
[<span class="hljs-string">'a'</span>, <span class="hljs-string">'c'</span>]
[<span class="hljs-string">'a'</span>, <span class="hljs-string">'c'</span>, <span class="hljs-string">'d'</span>]
[<span class="hljs-string">'a'</span>, <span class="hljs-string">'d'</span>]
[<span class="hljs-string">'b'</span>]
[<span class="hljs-string">'b'</span>, <span class="hljs-string">'c'</span>]
[<span class="hljs-string">'b'</span>, <span class="hljs-string">'c'</span>, <span class="hljs-string">'d'</span>]
[<span class="hljs-string">'b'</span>, <span class="hljs-string">'d'</span>]
[<span class="hljs-string">'c'</span>]
[<span class="hljs-string">'c'</span>, <span class="hljs-string">'d'</span>]
[<span class="hljs-string">'d'</span>]
</code></pre>

<p>3 functions:</p>
<ol>
<li>all combinations of n elements list</li>
<li>all combinations of n elements list where order is not distinct</li>
<li>all permutations</li>
</ol>
<pre class="lang-py s-code-block"><code class="hljs language-python"><span class="hljs-keyword">import</span> sys

<span class="hljs-keyword">def</span> <span class="hljs-title function_">permutations</span>(<span class="hljs-params">a</span>):
    <span class="hljs-keyword">return</span> combinations(a, <span class="hljs-built_in">len</span>(a))

<span class="hljs-keyword">def</span> <span class="hljs-title function_">combinations</span>(<span class="hljs-params">a, n</span>):
    <span class="hljs-keyword">if</span> n == <span class="hljs-number">1</span>:
        <span class="hljs-keyword">for</span> x <span class="hljs-keyword">in</span> a:
            <span class="hljs-keyword">yield</span> [x]
    <span class="hljs-keyword">else</span>:
        <span class="hljs-keyword">for</span> i <span class="hljs-keyword">in</span> <span class="hljs-built_in">range</span>(<span class="hljs-built_in">len</span>(a)):
            <span class="hljs-keyword">for</span> x <span class="hljs-keyword">in</span> combinations(a[:i] + a[i+<span class="hljs-number">1</span>:], n-<span class="hljs-number">1</span>):
                <span class="hljs-keyword">yield</span> [a[i]] + x

<span class="hljs-keyword">def</span> <span class="hljs-title function_">combinationsNoOrder</span>(<span class="hljs-params">a, n</span>):
    <span class="hljs-keyword">if</span> n == <span class="hljs-number">1</span>:
        <span class="hljs-keyword">for</span> x <span class="hljs-keyword">in</span> a:
            <span class="hljs-keyword">yield</span> [x]
    <span class="hljs-keyword">else</span>:
        <span class="hljs-keyword">for</span> i <span class="hljs-keyword">in</span> <span class="hljs-built_in">range</span>(<span class="hljs-built_in">len</span>(a)):
            <span class="hljs-keyword">for</span> x <span class="hljs-keyword">in</span> combinationsNoOrder(a[:i], n-<span class="hljs-number">1</span>):
                <span class="hljs-keyword">yield</span> [a[i]] + x
    
<span class="hljs-keyword">if</span> __name__ == <span class="hljs-string">"__main__"</span>:
    <span class="hljs-keyword">for</span> s <span class="hljs-keyword">in</span> combinations(<span class="hljs-built_in">list</span>(<span class="hljs-built_in">map</span>(<span class="hljs-built_in">int</span>, sys.argv[<span class="hljs-number">2</span>:])), <span class="hljs-built_in">int</span>(sys.argv[<span class="hljs-number">1</span>])):
        <span class="hljs-built_in">print</span>(s)
</code></pre>

<pre class="lang-py s-code-block"><code class="hljs language-python"><span class="hljs-keyword">from</span> itertools <span class="hljs-keyword">import</span> permutations, combinations


features = [<span class="hljs-string">'A'</span>, <span class="hljs-string">'B'</span>, <span class="hljs-string">'C'</span>]
tmp = []
<span class="hljs-keyword">for</span> i <span class="hljs-keyword">in</span> <span class="hljs-built_in">range</span>(<span class="hljs-built_in">len</span>(features)):
    oc = combinations(features, i + <span class="hljs-number">1</span>)
    <span class="hljs-keyword">for</span> c <span class="hljs-keyword">in</span> oc:
        tmp.append(<span class="hljs-built_in">list</span>(c))
</code></pre>

<hr>

<p>output</p>

<pre class="lang-py s-code-block"><code class="hljs language-python">[
 [<span class="hljs-string">'A'</span>],
 [<span class="hljs-string">'B'</span>],
 [<span class="hljs-string">'C'</span>],
 [<span class="hljs-string">'A'</span>, <span class="hljs-string">'B'</span>],
 [<span class="hljs-string">'A'</span>, <span class="hljs-string">'C'</span>],
 [<span class="hljs-string">'B'</span>, <span class="hljs-string">'C'</span>],
 [<span class="hljs-string">'A'</span>, <span class="hljs-string">'B'</span>, <span class="hljs-string">'C'</span>]
]
</code></pre>

<p>How about this.. used a string instead of list, but same thing.. string can be treated like a list in Python:</p>

<pre class="lang-py s-code-block"><code class="hljs language-python"><span class="hljs-keyword">def</span> <span class="hljs-title function_">comb</span>(<span class="hljs-params">s, res</span>):
    <span class="hljs-keyword">if</span> <span class="hljs-keyword">not</span> s: <span class="hljs-keyword">return</span>
    res.add(s)
    <span class="hljs-keyword">for</span> i <span class="hljs-keyword">in</span> <span class="hljs-built_in">range</span>(<span class="hljs-number">0</span>, <span class="hljs-built_in">len</span>(s)):
        t = s[<span class="hljs-number">0</span>:i] + s[i + <span class="hljs-number">1</span>:]
        comb(t, res)

res = <span class="hljs-built_in">set</span>()
comb(<span class="hljs-string">'game'</span>, res) 

<span class="hljs-built_in">print</span>(res)
</code></pre>

<p>Without using itertools:</p>

<pre class="lang-py s-code-block"><code class="hljs language-python"><span class="hljs-keyword">def</span> <span class="hljs-title function_">combine</span>(<span class="hljs-params">inp</span>):
    <span class="hljs-keyword">return</span> combine_helper(inp, [], [])


<span class="hljs-keyword">def</span> <span class="hljs-title function_">combine_helper</span>(<span class="hljs-params">inp, temp, ans</span>):
    <span class="hljs-keyword">for</span> i <span class="hljs-keyword">in</span> <span class="hljs-built_in">range</span>(<span class="hljs-built_in">len</span>(inp)):
        current = inp[i]
        remaining = inp[i + <span class="hljs-number">1</span>:]
        temp.append(current)
        ans.append(<span class="hljs-built_in">tuple</span>(temp))
        combine_helper(remaining, temp, ans)
        temp.pop()
    <span class="hljs-keyword">return</span> ans


<span class="hljs-built_in">print</span>(combine([<span class="hljs-string">'a'</span>, <span class="hljs-string">'b'</span>, <span class="hljs-string">'c'</span>, <span class="hljs-string">'d'</span>]))
</code></pre>

<p>This is my implementation</p>
<pre class="lang-py s-code-block"><code class="hljs language-python"><span class="hljs-keyword">def</span> <span class="hljs-title function_">get_combinations</span>(<span class="hljs-params">list_of_things</span>):
<span class="hljs-string">"""gets every combination of things in a list returned as a list of lists

Should be read : add all combinations of a certain size to the end of a list for every possible size in the
the list_of_things.

"""</span>
list_of_combinations = [<span class="hljs-built_in">list</span>(combinations_of_a_certain_size)
                        <span class="hljs-keyword">for</span> possible_size_of_combinations <span class="hljs-keyword">in</span> <span class="hljs-built_in">range</span>(<span class="hljs-number">1</span>,  <span class="hljs-built_in">len</span>(list_of_things))
                        <span class="hljs-keyword">for</span> combinations_of_a_certain_size <span class="hljs-keyword">in</span> itertools.combinations(list_of_things,
                                                                                     possible_size_of_combinations)]
<span class="hljs-keyword">return</span> list_of_combinations
</code></pre>

<p>Using list comprehension:</p>

<pre class="lang-py s-code-block"><code class="hljs language-python"><span class="hljs-keyword">def</span> <span class="hljs-title function_">selfCombine</span>(<span class="hljs-params"> list2Combine, length </span>):
    listCombined = <span class="hljs-built_in">str</span>( [<span class="hljs-string">'list2Combine[i'</span> + <span class="hljs-built_in">str</span>( i ) + <span class="hljs-string">']'</span> <span class="hljs-keyword">for</span> i <span class="hljs-keyword">in</span> <span class="hljs-built_in">range</span>( length )] ).replace( <span class="hljs-string">"'"</span>, <span class="hljs-string">''</span> ) \
                     + <span class="hljs-string">'for i0 in range(len( list2Combine ) )'</span>
    <span class="hljs-keyword">if</span> length &gt; <span class="hljs-number">1</span>:
        listCombined += <span class="hljs-built_in">str</span>( [<span class="hljs-string">' for i'</span> + <span class="hljs-built_in">str</span>( i ) + <span class="hljs-string">' in range( i'</span> + <span class="hljs-built_in">str</span>( i - <span class="hljs-number">1</span> ) + <span class="hljs-string">', len( list2Combine ) )'</span> <span class="hljs-keyword">for</span> i <span class="hljs-keyword">in</span> <span class="hljs-built_in">range</span>( <span class="hljs-number">1</span>, length )] )\
            .replace( <span class="hljs-string">"', '"</span>, <span class="hljs-string">' '</span> )\
            .replace( <span class="hljs-string">"['"</span>, <span class="hljs-string">''</span> )\
            .replace( <span class="hljs-string">"']"</span>, <span class="hljs-string">''</span> )

    listCombined = <span class="hljs-string">'['</span> + listCombined + <span class="hljs-string">']'</span>
    listCombined = <span class="hljs-built_in">eval</span>( listCombined )

    <span class="hljs-keyword">return</span> listCombined

list2Combine = [<span class="hljs-string">'A'</span>, <span class="hljs-string">'B'</span>, <span class="hljs-string">'C'</span>]
listCombined = selfCombine( list2Combine, <span class="hljs-number">2</span> )
</code></pre>

<p>Output would be:</p>

<pre class="lang-py s-code-block"><code class="hljs language-python">[<span class="hljs-string">'A'</span>, <span class="hljs-string">'A'</span>]
[<span class="hljs-string">'A'</span>, <span class="hljs-string">'B'</span>]
[<span class="hljs-string">'A'</span>, <span class="hljs-string">'C'</span>]
[<span class="hljs-string">'B'</span>, <span class="hljs-string">'B'</span>]
[<span class="hljs-string">'B'</span>, <span class="hljs-string">'C'</span>]
[<span class="hljs-string">'C'</span>, <span class="hljs-string">'C'</span>]
</code></pre>

<p>I'm late to the party but would like to share the solution I found to the same issue:
Specifically, I was looking to do sequential combinations, so for "STAR" I wanted "STAR", "TA", "AR", but not "SR".</p>
<pre class="lang-py s-code-block"><code class="hljs language-python">lst = [S, T, A, R]
lstCombos = []
<span class="hljs-keyword">for</span> Length <span class="hljs-keyword">in</span> <span class="hljs-built_in">range</span>(<span class="hljs-number">0</span>,<span class="hljs-built_in">len</span>(lst)+<span class="hljs-number">1</span>):
    <span class="hljs-keyword">for</span> i <span class="hljs-keyword">in</span> lst:
        lstCombos.append(lst[lst.index(i):lst.index(i)+Length])
</code></pre>
<p>Duplicates can be filtered with adding in an additional if before the last line:</p>
<pre class="lang-py s-code-block"><code class="hljs language-python">lst = [S, T, A, R]
lstCombos = []
<span class="hljs-keyword">for</span> Length <span class="hljs-keyword">in</span> <span class="hljs-built_in">range</span>(<span class="hljs-number">0</span>,<span class="hljs-built_in">len</span>(lst)+<span class="hljs-number">1</span>):
    <span class="hljs-keyword">for</span> i <span class="hljs-keyword">in</span> lst:
         <span class="hljs-keyword">if</span> <span class="hljs-keyword">not</span> lst[lst.index(i):lst.index(i)+Length]) <span class="hljs-keyword">in</span> lstCombos:
             lstCombos.append(lst[lst.index(i):lst.index(i)+Length])
</code></pre>
<p>If for some reason this returns blank lists in the output, which happened to me, I added:</p>
<pre class="lang-py s-code-block"><code class="hljs language-python"><span class="hljs-keyword">for</span> subList <span class="hljs-keyword">in</span> lstCombos:
    <span class="hljs-keyword">if</span> subList = <span class="hljs-string">''</span>:
         lstCombos.remove(subList)
</code></pre>

<p>If you do not want to use combinations library, here is the solution:</p>
<pre class="lang-py s-code-block"><code class="hljs language-python">nums = [<span class="hljs-number">1</span>,<span class="hljs-number">2</span>,<span class="hljs-number">3</span>]
p = [[]]
fnl = [[],nums]

<span class="hljs-keyword">for</span> i <span class="hljs-keyword">in</span> <span class="hljs-built_in">range</span>(<span class="hljs-built_in">len</span>(nums)):
    <span class="hljs-keyword">for</span> j <span class="hljs-keyword">in</span> <span class="hljs-built_in">range</span>(i+<span class="hljs-number">1</span>,<span class="hljs-built_in">len</span>(nums)):
        p[-<span class="hljs-number">1</span>].append([i,j])

<span class="hljs-keyword">for</span> i <span class="hljs-keyword">in</span> <span class="hljs-built_in">range</span>(<span class="hljs-built_in">len</span>(nums)-<span class="hljs-number">3</span>):
    p.append([])
    <span class="hljs-keyword">for</span> m <span class="hljs-keyword">in</span> p[-<span class="hljs-number">2</span>]:
        p[-<span class="hljs-number">1</span>].append(m+[m[-<span class="hljs-number">1</span>]+<span class="hljs-number">1</span>])

<span class="hljs-keyword">for</span> i <span class="hljs-keyword">in</span> p:
    <span class="hljs-keyword">for</span> j <span class="hljs-keyword">in</span> i:
        n = []
        <span class="hljs-keyword">for</span> m <span class="hljs-keyword">in</span> j:
            <span class="hljs-keyword">if</span> m &lt; <span class="hljs-built_in">len</span>(nums):
                n.append(nums[m])
        <span class="hljs-keyword">if</span> n <span class="hljs-keyword">not</span> <span class="hljs-keyword">in</span> fnl:
            fnl.append(n)

<span class="hljs-keyword">for</span> i <span class="hljs-keyword">in</span> nums:
    <span class="hljs-keyword">if</span> [i] <span class="hljs-keyword">not</span> <span class="hljs-keyword">in</span> fnl:
        fnl.append([i])

<span class="hljs-built_in">print</span>(fnl)
</code></pre>
<p>Output:</p>
<pre class="lang-py s-code-block"><code class="hljs language-python">[[], [<span class="hljs-number">1</span>, <span class="hljs-number">2</span>, <span class="hljs-number">3</span>], [<span class="hljs-number">1</span>, <span class="hljs-number">2</span>], [<span class="hljs-number">1</span>, <span class="hljs-number">3</span>], [<span class="hljs-number">2</span>, <span class="hljs-number">3</span>], [<span class="hljs-number">1</span>], [<span class="hljs-number">2</span>], [<span class="hljs-number">3</span>]]
</code></pre>
